name: Super Jumper (Visar Dema)
description:
Jump with spacebar.

move with arrow keys.

Super Jumper, where you can jump and jump and never get tired.
Collect fruits, bop enemies’ heads, , a fun and cute casual game.
Explore a magical wonderland with so many cute animal.
Overcome the obstacles, avoid the traps and advance.
Over 8 characters to unlock including
2D crazy adventure game
* Multiple levels with increasing difficulty
* A wide variety of traps
* Easy to use controls
* Puzzle game with lots of puzzles to solve using your brain
* A bunch of surprises that you may or may not like
* New levels are added every week
* Pixel Game
* Adventure game filled with frustrating Traps
* Jump like hell. Leaping is the best step you can go for.

Assets:

https://pixel-frog.itch.io/
